secondPage.description:
Ever borrowed in DeFi? Taking out a loan at 5%
and paying 15% shortly after is an everyday reality.

Manually comparing loan providers is a tedious task,
refinancing as rates change is expensive in gas and time.
secondPage.descriptionMobile:
Ever borrowed in DeFi?
Taking out a loan at 5% and
paying 15% shortly after is
an everyday reality.

Manually comparing loan
providers is a tedious task,
refinancing as rates change
is expensive in gas and time.

thirdPage.description:
Routing your loan through Fuji ensures you get
the best borrow rate, aggregated across all providers.

Better opportunity? The protocol automatically
refinances the whole pool of loans to the new lowest APR.

initBorrow.liquidityNotification: Liquidity for this transaction comes from
initBorrow.helper: Liquidity for this transaction comes from <1>{{provider}}</1>
initBorrow.insufficientBorrow: Please, type the amount at least 1
initBorrow.collateralRequiredAmount: Please, type the amount you want to provide as collateral
initBorrow.insufficientCollateral: Please, provide at least <1>{{neededCollateral}}</1> as collateral!

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: With Fuji you reduce your loan expenses by <1>~10%</1>. The protocol constantly <1>monitors</1> borrow markets and automatically <1>refinances</1> its debt positions at the best available rates.

healthFactor.title: Health Factor
healthFactor.tooltip:
The health factor represents the safety of your loan derived from the proportion of collateral versus amount borrowed.
<1>Keep it above 1 to avoid liquidation.

currentLoanToValue.title: Current Loan-to-Value
currentLoanToValue.tooltip:
The Maximum Loan-to-Value ratio represents the maximum borrow limit.
A max. LTV of {{threshold}}% means the user can borrow up to ${{threshold}} in the principal currency for every $100 worth of collateral.
<5>With LTV above {{ threshold }}% they risk a liquidation.

apr.tooltip: Live fetching borrow rates from underlying protocols that provide liquidity.
